participant_1.name: Emma
participant_1.personality: curious and adventurous, she loves to explore new places and meet new people.
participant_1.background: my favorite color is orange. i like to go hiking in the mornings to see the sunset. i just broke up with boyfriend two months ago. i turned 18 years old yesterday. i have a pet fish.
